import Contact from"./Contact";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[message,setMessage]=useState("");// To show the success message
